local_intent: Perceive, align yaw to 0°, then push the T-block forward by 0.1 m and verify visibility.
assumptions: ApproachAndAlign achieves side contact suitable for pushing
Target remains visible after the push
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT semantics: detect, align with tolerance 0.005, set yaw 0°, perform a forward push (distance 0.1, direction 0°), then verify. Uses only library nodes and binned values; realizes the LOCAL_ANNOTATION Push leaf.
